# isContinuous

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that, together with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubber/mode-swift.property] property, determines scrubber interaction style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isContinuous: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

For details on how to choose the right [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubber/isContinuous] value for your app, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubber#Choose-a-scrubber-touch-interaction-model].

## Changing the layout

- **scrubberLayout**: An object used to describe the layout of items within the scrubber.
- **mode**: A setting that determines whether interaction with the scrubber is fixed or free.
- **NSScrubber.Mode**: The scrolling behavior for a scrubber.
- **itemAlignment**: A setting that specifies the snapping behavior of items in the scrubber.
- **NSScrubber.Alignment**: The specified preferred alignment of items within the scrubber, when they come to rest following a user’s scrolling or paging interaction.
